column4: Ok, I put the folder in ".themes" folder after extracting from tar.gz and then tried to drag it to the appearance manager under themes section. It gave this error. "Installation for theme "DigitalDark-2-Mercury-1.2" failed. Can't move directory over directory".
I can't see it in my themes tab.
just drag the tar.gz to the themes window in appearance or click install theme and select the tar.gz
